name: Bramble Knots
description:
Controls

Just aim your mouse where you want to go :)

Bramble Knots

Help your strange bramble-vine-plant-thing grow to fill up as much space as possible. The more twisty and intertwined the better.

The challenge here is mostly to get a high Tightness score.

Game Jam Stuff

This game was made for the Mini Jam 101. The theme was 'Limit' and the limitation was 'Control The Environment'. I have interpreted these a little loosely. You are very limited in space (at least that's the intent), and you create the environment as you grow your plant thingy so, in a sense, you are controlling the environment by creating it.

I didn't have much time for this jam unfortunately, so the game is mostly a prototype :/
